resources.string:
A verified badge is check that aapears next to an 
Rapchik accounts name to indiacte that the 
account is the authentic presence of notable 
public figure , celebrity, global brand or entity it 
represents.
Submitting a request for verification \ndoes not guarantee that your account will be verified

We require a goverment-issued photo ID that shows 
your name and date of birth(e.g driver's license.
passport or national identification card) or official 
business documents(tax filing, recent utility bill, article of 
incorporation) in order to review your request.
Delete Function not available in demo

Rapchik is short video and social platform created by Indians for Indians. Its provide a unique platform to showcase their creativity and innovative ideas. Rapchik provide a simple and seamless user interface to create, edit and share short video. It comes with an AI assistant Richie to make the interaction easy and funny. We in Rapchik respect user\'s privacy and ensure to protect it.
Richie is Assistant for Rapchik app powered by AI. Richie can help you to use Rapchik app, also she is smart enough to sing some song. Say Hi to Richie by clicking on the icon.
